img_above_text:
## Black Wind Cave Awaken Wine Worm
Black Wind Cave Awaken Wine Worm
img_below_text:
The Awaken Wine Worm in Chapter 1 is hidden in a temple guarded by the Black Wind King. After defeating the boss, head to the left side of the temple and break the pots to uncover your first Awaken Wine Worm.
## Marsh of the White Mist Awaken Wine Worms

img_summary: The image depicts a character standing near a group of large pots in a dimly lit environment, with glowing particles emanating from the area. This scene aligns with the context of locating the first Awaken Wine Worm in the Black Wind Cave. The glowing effect suggests the hidden item (the Awaken Wine Worm) is being uncovered after breaking the pots, as described in the accompanying text. The image serves to visually guide players on where and how to find this collectible.
